temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls randomness: higher values produce more creative results

top_p.description: Nucleus sampling: considers tokens with top_p probability mass

top_k.description: Only sample from the K most likely tokens

min_p.description: Only tokens with at least this probability are considered
